intro: Psychotria longirostris, commonly known as the long-beaked psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its slender, woody stems and opposite, elliptical leaves. Its flowers are small, tubular, and typically greenish-white in color, with prominent stamens.
